text:
@jeffsessions @realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden Disappointed in @jeffsessions ! Then again, I have difficulty with brown nosers!
@realDonaldTrump 's campaign speech was racist, his comments on COVID19 regarding masks and testing showed what an embecile  he is! Trump and this Administration is the most corrupt in modern history
